page.title: 06SHOPS IN STONE
page.content: In Stone there are lots of places where you can buy goods;suchas petrol,food and drinks.There is a bridal shop where you can buy things for special occasions. Also there are two petrol stations and a village hall. At the Villge Hall you can hire it for an amount of money for functions. There is a Post Office inside which you can buy sweets,groceries,stationery and there is a newsagent department. There are four public houses in which you buy snacks. There is one church and one chapel where services are held. There is a hospital called St.Johns, which specialises in Mental Health, alot of the villagers work there.
